changeSet.comment: Change date format for dataype date,pdate (MM/dd/YYYY) to ISO-8601
changeSet.sql: update item_data set value= substring(item_data.value from 7 for 4) || '-' || substring(item_data.value from 1 for 2) || '-' || substring(item_data.value from 4 for 2) from item where item_data.item_id = item.item_id and (item_data_type_id = 9 or item_data_type_id = 10) and upper(value) ~* '[0-9][0-9]/[0-9][0-9]/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]';
